pubspec.name: flutter_gen_ai_chat_ui
pubspec.description: High-performance Flutter UI kit for AI chat: streaming markdown, code highlighting, theming, and customizable integration hooks for major LLMs.

sections.title: Provide documentation
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: 20% or more of the public API has dartdoc comments

316 out of 427 API elements (74.0 %) have documentation comments.

Some symbols that are missing documentation: `flutter_gen_ai_chat_ui.AiChatConfig.AiChatConfig.new`, `flutter_gen_ai_chat_ui.AiChatWidget.AiChatWidget.new`, `flutter_gen_ai_chat_ui.BubbleStyle.BubbleStyle.new`, `flutter_gen_ai_chat_ui.ChatInput.ChatInput.new`, `flutter_gen_ai_chat_ui.ChatMedia.ChatMedia.new`.
